channel.title: Development on My digital journey
channel.description: Recent content in Development on My digital journey

item.title: Azure OpenAI Assistant
item.description:
OpenAI is the next shiny thing

I’ve been following OpenAI developement closely ever since its inception. I was a bit hesitant on upgrading, fearing I wouldn’t use its full potential (Also I’m quite frugal…:smirk:). Fortunately there’s also a pay-as-you-go plan for using the API directly. This gives you more control on your credits.

When Microsoft announced their version, I was excited about it, as I’m always in Azure. I also have a monthly credit to spend. You do need to apply for it, but that process is quite easy. Once you gain access the fun can begin!
